### Flutter-manager

---
### Features
- Install \ Uninstall Flutter

#### How to use Flutter manager?
Download the latest flutter-manager binary and execute it.
```
flutter-manager
```

---
### Q&A

Why use this?
- Save time, Deploy across multiple systems within seconds.
